name: Health Potion
description: A basic healing potion that restores HP.
plaggComment: Healing juice! Not as good as cheese, but it works.

name: Mana Potion
plaggComment: Magic juice! Tastes like blue cheese water.

name: Strength Elixir
plaggComment: Power boost! Like the strength I get from aged cheddar!

name: Aged Cheese Wheel
description: Plagg's favorite! Fully restores HP and provides temporary buffs.
plaggComment: PERFECT! This is what I'm talking about! Pure cheese power!

name: Stamina Bread
plaggComment: Bread is okay... but where's the cheese to go with it?
